docs.lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan have been obfuscating their plans for Medicare, Medicaid and what they will do to reform the health care system.

headline.seo: The Republican Ticket Twists the Facts About Health Care
headline.main: Twisting the Facts About Health Care
headline.print_headline: Twisting the Facts About Health Care

docs.abstract: Editorial contends it is difficult to evaluate difference between Pres Obama's health care plan and Mitt Romney's health care proposals because Romney has been so artful about obfuscating his plans for reforming system; highlights major gaps in Romney's policy proposals.
docs.snippet: Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan have been obfuscating their plans for Medicare, Medicaid and what they will do to reform the health care system.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: Are Doctors Too Wary of Drug Companies?

docs.abstract: In our zeal to single out the pharmaceutical industry's biases, we may have become blind to our own.
docs.snippet: In our zeal to single out the pharmaceutical industry's biases, we may have become blind to our own.

docs.abstract: We're getting smarter about the way we're addressing social problems. And patterns in the most effective solutions are emerging.
